issue.title: [JS] Draft roadmap / planning document for JS library development
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1668](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1668). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like to write a document to sketch out a development plan for building out the JS library. This will include generic Arrow plumbing (messaging with other Arrow providers and consumers) as well as building a library of built-in data manipulations for Arrow data.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1668?focusedCommentId=16239659) by Paul Taylor (paul.e.taylor):*
Initial doc up at https://docs.google.com/document/d/142dek89oM2TVI2Yql106Zo8IB1Ff_9zDg_EG6jPWS0M/edit

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1668?focusedCommentId=16259923) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I am moving this to the 1.0.0 milestone for now. I would like to publicize the roadmap a bit more and call for community contributions. I am not sure the best way to do this, we could create a roadmap area on the Arrow website?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1668?focusedCommentId=16982036) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
The JavaScript JIRA issues are effectively the roadmap, so that is sufficient for now
